heading: THE LIVE NETWORK
subheading: Real-time activity across the MBI Ecosystem.

items.message: Aforevo Studios wraps production on 'Lagos Heist' – starring Zubby Michael.
MBI Network crossed 550 Million total views for January 2026.
Burna Boy exclusive interview live now on Vybz FM Digital.
MBI Rights Manager blocked 14,000 piracy attempts this week.
Welcome 5 new Ghanian creators to the Aforevo Partner Program.
